title: Devil may cry 3 update 1.3.0_+_No-Cd fix_+_xbox controller confi
description:
This is the devil may cry complete fix!!

Devil may cry 3 1.3.0 update.

Devil may cry 3 no-cd fix.

Xbox controller Configuration.

 If you already have your copy of this game updated to the 1.3.0 version then
skip steps 1 and 2.

-step 1- install the dmc3se_130_update.

-step 2- copy and replace the dmc3se with the dmc3se.exe file located in the directory where you installed the game.

-step 3- copy and replace one of the xbox controller configurations with the file dmc3se.ini file located in the directory where you installed the game.

                                                                 enjoy!!
                                                                              kah0z
